custom-workflow.author: Voronyuk.M@3soft.ru
custom-workflow.before-save: if !@current_journal.nil? && @current_journal.send_to_owner owner_email = @issue.custom_field_value( CustomField.find_by_name('owner-email') ) raise WorkflowError, "It's impossible to send an email to nobody! Specify the owner's email or uncheck the flag 'Send mail to supportclient'" if owner_email.blank? end
custom-workflow.name: check if owner-email is filled when send_to_owner is checked
